root.name: Tear Ring Saga: Berwick Saga
root.description: OverviewTear Ring Saga: Berwick Saga is a 2005 PS2 strategy RPG developed by Tirnanog and published by Enterbrain. A sequel to the PlayStation strategy RPG Tear Ring Saga, it is, like its predecessor, heavily reminiscent of the Fire Emblem franchise. Possibly due to the legal issues Tirnanog and Enterbrain encountered with the first game (Nintendo sued, accusing the developer of copyright infringement and won on appeal), Berwick Saga is also the last game in the series.
